mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userpwd, username, userphone, useremail, userzipcode, useraddr, userdetailaddr, birthday, joindate, usertype, userstop, point) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{userphone}, #{useremail}, #{userzipcode}, #{useraddr}, #{userdetailaddr}, #{birthday}, sysdate, 1, 'N',0)
mapper.select: select count(userid) from member where userid = #{param1}
select userid, username, usertype, userstop from member where userid=#{param1} and userpwd=#{param2}
select userinfocontent from useinfo where userinfotitle = #{param1}
